dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I sense the warmth of the living approaching me. What do you seek, mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Peace is a fleeting concept to one like me. Your words do not sway me. Decide your fate, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave you be and continue my journey.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your wisdom in retreat saves you this time. Remember this encounter, mortal. We shall meet again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to combat, freezing wraith!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, a brave fool you are to challenge the Frostbloom Wraith. A mistake that will cost you dearly!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to learn about the freezing wraiths. Tell me of your kind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity from the living? How amusing. Very well, I shall enlighten you before your demise.
Freezing wraiths like me are born of frost and shadow, forever bound to the icy abyss. Now, what more do you seek, mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your purpose and nature.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: To understand the Frostbloom Wraith is to face the unfathomable darkness within yourself. Proceed with caution, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge your wisdom and take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, mortal. Knowledge alone shall not protect you from the chill of death. Farewell.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: This knowledge is useless. I will be on my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge discarded reveals ignorance. A common trait among the living. Farewell, fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek your aid in a quest against a common enemy. Will you join me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance proposal from a mortal? Amusing. State your plea, and we shall see.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we can vanquish our foes and rule the realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity with the Frostbloom Wraith? Such arrogance deserves swift justice!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I shall proceed alone. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your path of solitude suits you well, mortal. Leave now before my patience wanes.
